Body.Content:
The updated Browse Connectors/Actions pane in Cloud flows designer for Power Automate is being released. This update will allow users to search for and select connectors/actions they frequently use in Cloud flows more quickly and efficiently. This feature is expected to be generally available by January 30, 2024.

How does this affect me?
Following the release of this feature, you will be able to:
  • Favorite any connector/action so that they show up in the Add action pane by default under the Favorites section.
  • Quickly access AI capabilities in the product under the AI capabilities section.
    • This can be utilized in building blocks/builtin tools like Control, Data operation, JSON, etc. under the 'Builtin tools' section.
What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Automate â€“ Updated Browse Connectors/Actions pane in Cloud flows
